players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "That's a lie, Diana. I'm the detective and I investigated you last night. You're the mafioso trying to frame me."
Bob: "Diana is lying. I investigated her and she's mafia. Vote Diana to save the town."
Diana: "Alice, Bob is lying. I am the detective and he is mafia. Trust me and vote Bob with me."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
